name: Himanshu Khadka
title: Customer
message: In my terms, Ihave tried hiring couple of times and all chefs were great to be.

name: Bhupendra Sapkota
title: Customer
message: The chef was great at my daughter birthday party all the children and adults enjoyed the food very much.

name: Samrakshyan Adhikari
title: Customer
message: For valentine day, i wanted to surprise my wife with some italian food. I was skeptical at first but they were delicious as if we were dining in a real restaurant, was very pleased with it

name: Keshav Sigdel
title: Customer
message: On the weekend, wanted to enjoy some indian streetfood at home with few friends after completing a project and taking a break and we were in awe. All the foods were packed with flavors, best experience ever.

name: Nishant Thapa
title: Customer
message: Thanks to the chef for saving in pinch of time, i had guests for my promotion party and more people were going to come than expections and i wanted to impress them and thanks to chefhire i was able to provide my guest with so many food options .
